description:
Extract common agent pipeline patterns (planning → execution → reporting) into a PipelineBuilder that allows declarative composition of stages with dependency declaration, parallel execution support, and automatic checkpoint/resume functionality.

**Rationale:** Research and Solve agents share similar multi-stage patterns but implement them separately. A pipeline abstraction would reduce code duplication, enable easier workflow modifications, provide consistent error handling, and support features like partial execution resume.
title: Create Modular Pipeline Builder with Composable Stages
